paragraphs: Simple Bundles is the fastest way to send order details with multi-SKU bundles and kits to 3PLs, WMS, shipping software, and other third-party integrations (e.g. ShipStation and Fulfillment by Amazon)
Simple Bundles breaks down bundle orders to individual SKUs to allow real-time inventory syncing and ease of order fulfillment. [Learn more](#)
